00034 CONST TCHAR  PLUGIN_NAME[] = _T("NativeLang");

00036 CONST UINT nbItem = 1;
00037 FuncItem funcItem[nbItem];

00039 TCHAR                   configPath[MAX_PATH];
00040 TCHAR                   iniFilePath[MAX_PATH];
00041 
00042 /* global values */
00043 NppData                 nppData;
00044 HANDLE                  g_hModule;
00045 BOOL                    bLangFileExist;
00046 HelpDlg                 helpDlg;
00047 vector<string>  vSupportedPlugins;

00049 /* standard values in functions */

00056 
00057 BOOL APIENTRY DllMain( HANDLE hModule, 
00058                        DWORD  reasonForCall, 
00059                        LPVOID lpReserved )
00060 {
00061         g_hModule = hModule;
00062 
00063     switch (reasonForCall)
00064     {
00065                 case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00066                 {
00067                         /* Set function pointers */
00068                         funcItem[0]._pFunc = openHelpDlg;
00069                         
00070                         /* Fill menu names */
00071                         _tcscpy(funcItem[0]._itemName, _T("&About..."));
00072 
00073                         /* Set shortcuts */
00074                         funcItem[0]._pShKey = NULL;
00075 
00076                         vSupportedPlugins.clear();
00077 
00078                         break;
00079                 }       
00080                 case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:
00081                 {
00082                         break;
00083                 }
00084                 case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:
00085                         break;
00086                         
00087                 case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
00088                         break;
00089     }
00090 
00091     return TRUE;
00092 }
00093 
00094 extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) void setInfo(NppData notpadPlusData)
00095 {
00096         /* stores notepad data */
00097         nppData = notpadPlusData;
00098 
00099         /* initialize the config directory */
00100         ::SendMessage(nppData._nppHandle, NPPM_GETPLUGINSCONFIGDIR, MAX_PATH, (LPARAM)configPath);
00101 
00102         /* Test if config path exist */
00103         if (::PathFileExists(configPath) == FALSE)
00104         {
00105                 ::CreateDirectory(configPath, NULL);
00106         }
00107 
00108         _tcscpy(iniFilePath, configPath);
00109         _tcscat(iniFilePath, NATIVELANG_INI);
00110         bLangFileExist = ::PathFileExists(iniFilePath);
00111 
00112         if (bLangFileExist == FALSE)
00113         {
00114                 TCHAR   temp[MAX_PATH];
00115                 _stprintf(temp, _T("NativeLang.ini file not found! Copy it to path:\r\n%s"), iniFilePath);
00116                 vSupportedPlugins.push_back(temp);
00117         }
00118 
00119         /* initialize help dialog */
00120         helpDlg.init((HINSTANCE)g_hModule, nppData);
00121 }
00122 
00123 extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) LPCTSTR getName()
00124 {
00125         return PLUGIN_NAME;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void openHelpDlg(void)
00129 {
00130         helpDlg.doDialog();
00131 }

00134 extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) FuncItem * getFuncsArray(INT *nbF)
00135 {
00136         *nbF = nbItem;
00137         return funcItem;

00140 /***
00141  *      beNotification()
00142  *
00143  *      This function is called, if a notification in Scantilla/Notepad++ occurs
00144  */
00145 extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) void beNotified(SCNotification *notifyCode)
00146 {
00147         if (notifyCode->nmhdr.hwndFrom == nppData._nppHandle)
00148         {
00149                 if (notifyCode->nmhdr.code == NPPN_TBMODIFICATION)
00150                 {               
00151                         changeNppMenu(_T("NativeLang.dll"), _T("NativeLang"), funcItem, nbItem);
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 }
00155 
00156 /***
00157  *      messageProc()
00158  *
00159  *      This function is called, if a notification from Notepad occurs
00160  */
00161 extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) LRESULT messageProc(UINT Message, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
00162 {
00163         if ((bLangFileExist == TRUE) && (Message == NPPM_MSGTOPLUGIN))
00164         {
00165                 CommunicationInfo       *ci             = (CommunicationInfo*)lParam;
00166                 tNatLangInfo            *nli    = (tNatLangInfo*)ci->info;
00167 
00168                 attachSupportedPlugin(ci->srcModuleName);
00169 
00170                 switch (ci->internalMsg) 
00171                 {
00172                         case NPP_NATLANG_CHANGEDLG :
00173                         {
00174                                 changeDialog(ci->srcModuleName, nli->pszCtrl, (HWND)nli->hCtrl);
00175                                 break;
00176                         }
00177                         case NPP_NATLANG_CHANGENPPMENU :
00178                         {
00179                                 changeNppMenu(ci->srcModuleName, nli->pszCtrl, (FuncItem*)nli->lParam, (UINT)nli->wParam);
00180                                 break;
00181                         }
00182                         case NPP_NATLANG_CHANGEMENU :
00183                         {
00184                                 nli->lRes = changeMenu(ci->srcModuleName, nli->pszCtrl, (HMENU)nli->hCtrl, (UINT)nli->wParam);
00185                                 break;
00186                         }
00187                         case NPP_NATLANG_CHANGEHEADER :
00188                         {
00189                                 changeHeader(ci->srcModuleName, nli->pszCtrl, (HWND)nli->hCtrl);
00190                                 break;
00191                         }
00192                         case NPP_NATLANG_CHANGECOMBO :
00193                         {
00194                                 changeCombo(ci->srcModuleName, nli->pszCtrl, (HWND)nli->hCtrl, (UINT)nli->wParam);
00195                                 break;
00196                         }
00197                         case NPP_NATLANG_GETTEXT :
00198                         {
00199                                 nli->lRes = (LONG)getText(ci->srcModuleName, nli->pszCtrl, (LPWSTR*)nli->lParam, (UINT)nli->wParam);
00200                                 break;
00201                         }
00202                         default:
00203                         {
00204                                 TCHAR   temp[MAX_PATH];
00205                                 _stprintf(temp, _T("Plugin %s: Message %i does not exist!"), ci->srcModuleName, ci->internalMsg);
00206                                 ::MessageBox(nppData._nppHandle, temp, _T("NativeLang"), MB_OK);
00207                                 break;
00208                         }
00209                 }
00210         }
00211 
00212         return FALSE;
00213 }

00215 #ifdef UNICODE
00216 extern "C" __declspec(dllexport) BOOL isUnicode()
00217 {
00218         return TRUE;
00219 }
00220 #endif
00221 
00222 void attachSupportedPlugin(LPCTSTR strSupportedPlugin)
00223 {
00224         for (UINT i = 0; i < vSupportedPlugins.size(); i++)
00225                 if (_tcscmp(vSupportedPlugins[i].c_str(), strSupportedPlugin) == 0)
00226                         return;
00227 
00228         vSupportedPlugins.push_back(strSupportedPlugin);
00229 }
00230 
00231 /*************************************************************************************
00232  *      Set different elements
00233  */
00234 void changeDialog(LPCTSTR pszPlInName, LPCTSTR pszDlgName, HWND hDlg)
00235 {
00236         INT             id = 0;
00237         DWORD   dwSize = 1;
00238         LPWSTR  wPtr;
00239 
00240         _stprintf(sectionName, _T("%s %s"), pszPlInName, pszDlgName);
00241         dwSize = ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, NULL, NULL, wKeys, MAX_PATH*2, iniFilePath);
00242 
00243         wPtr = wKeys;
00244         while (wPtr < &wKeys[dwSize])
00245         {
00246                 if (_tcscmp(wPtr, _T("Caption")) == 0)
00247                 {
00248                         /* set caption */
00249                         ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, wPtr, _T(""), TEMP, MAX_PATH, iniFilePath);
00250                         if (_tcslen(TEMP)) {
00251                                 FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, TEMP, 0, 0, wFormatMsg, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00252                                 ::SetWindowText(hDlg, wFormatMsg);
00253                         }
00254                 } 
00255                 else if ((id = _tstoi(wPtr)) != 0)
00256                 {
00257                         /* set items */
00258                         ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, wPtr, _T(""), TEMP, MAX_PATH, iniFilePath);
00259                         FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, TEMP, 0, 0, wFormatMsg, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00260                         ::SetDlgItemText(hDlg, id, wFormatMsg);
00261                 }
00262                 wPtr += _tcslen(wPtr)+1;
00263         }
00264 }
00265 
00266 void changeNppMenu(LPCTSTR pszPlInName, LPCTSTR pszMenuName, FuncItem * funcItem, UINT count)
00267 {
00268         TCHAR   test[64];
00269         HMENU   hMenu   = (HMENU)::SendMessage(nppData._nppHandle, NPPM_GETMENUHANDLE, 0, 0);
00270 
00271         for (int i = 0; i < ::GetMenuItemCount(hMenu); i++) {
00272                 
00273                 /* find plugin string and rename */
00274                 ::GetMenuString(hMenu, i, TEMP, MAX_PATH, MF_BYPOSITION);
00275                 if (_tcscmp(pszMenuName, TEMP) == 0)
00276                 {
00277                         _stprintf(sectionName, _T("%s NppMenu"), pszPlInName);
00278 
00279                         INT pos = 0;
00280                         DWORD dwSize = ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, NULL, NULL, wKeys, MAX_PATH*2, iniFilePath);
00281                         LPWSTR  wPtr = wKeys;
00282                         while (wPtr < &wKeys[dwSize])
00283                         {
00284                                 if (_tcscmp(wPtr, _T("Main")) == 0)
00285                                 {
00286                                         ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, wPtr, _T(""), TEMP, MAX_PATH, iniFilePath);
00287                                         FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, TEMP, 0, 0, wFormatMsg, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00288                                         ::ModifyMenu(hMenu, i, MF_BYPOSITION | MF_STRING, i, wFormatMsg);
00289                                 }
00290                                 else
00291                                 {
00292                                         pos = _tstoi(wPtr);
00293                                         ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, wPtr, _T(""), TEMP, MAX_PATH, iniFilePath);
00294                                         FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, TEMP, 0, 0, wFormatMsg, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00295                                         ::ModifyMenu(hMenu, funcItem[pos]._cmdID, MF_BYCOMMAND | MF_STRING, funcItem[pos]._cmdID, wFormatMsg);
00296                                 }
00297                                 wPtr += _tcslen(wPtr)+1;
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300         }
00301 }
00302 
00303 BOOL changeMenu(LPCTSTR pszPlInName, LPCTSTR pszMenuName, HMENU hMenu, UINT uFlags)
00304 {
00305         INT             pos             = 0;
00306         DWORD   dwSize  = 0;
00307         LPWSTR  wPtr    = NULL;
00308 
00309         if ((uFlags != MF_BYCOMMAND) && (uFlags != MF_BYPOSITION))
00310                 return FALSE;
00311 
00312         _stprintf(sectionName, _T("%s %s"), pszPlInName, pszMenuName);
00313 
00314         dwSize = ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, NULL, NULL, wKeys, MAX_PATH*2, iniFilePath);
00315         wPtr = wKeys;
00316         while (wPtr < &wKeys[dwSize])
00317         {
00318                 /* set items */
00319                 pos = _tstoi(wPtr);
00320                 ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, wPtr, _T(""), TEMP, MAX_PATH, iniFilePath);
00321                 FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, TEMP, 0, 0, wFormatMsg, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00322                 if (uFlags == MF_BYCOMMAND)
00323                         ::ModifyMenu(hMenu, pos, MF_BYCOMMAND | MF_STRING, pos, wFormatMsg);
00324                 else
00325                         ::ModifyMenu(hMenu, pos, MF_BYPOSITION | MF_STRING, ::GetMenuItemID(hMenu, pos), wFormatMsg);
00326                 wPtr += _tcslen(wPtr)+1;
00327         }
00328         return TRUE;
00329 }
00330 
00331 void changeHeader(LPCTSTR pszPlInName, LPCTSTR pszHeaderName, HWND hHeader)
00332 {
00333         HDITEM  hdi;
00334 
00335         _stprintf(sectionName, _T("%s %s"), pszPlInName, pszHeaderName);
00336 
00337         hdi.mask                = HDI_TEXT|HDI_WIDTH|HDI_ORDER;
00338         hdi.cchTextMax  = MAX_PATH;
00339 
00340         UINT count = (UINT)::SendMessage(hHeader, HDM_GETITEMCOUNT, 0, 0);
00341         for (UINT i = 0; i < count; i++)
00342         {
00343                 hdi.pszText             = wKey;
00344                 ::SendMessage(hHeader, HDM_GETITEM, i, (LPARAM)&hdi);
00345                 if (::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, wKey, _T(""), TEMP, MAX_PATH, iniFilePath))
00346                 {
00347                         FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, TEMP, 0, 0, wFormatMsg, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00348                         hdi.pszText             = wFormatMsg;
00349                         ::SendMessage(hHeader, HDM_SETITEM, i, (LPARAM)&hdi);
00350                 }
00351         }
00352 }
00353 
00354 void changeCombo(LPCTSTR pszPlInName, LPCTSTR pszComboName, HWND hCombo, UINT count)
00355 {
00356         INT             pos             = 0;
00357         UINT    curSel  = 0;
00358         DWORD   dwSize  = 0;
00359         LPWSTR  wPtr    = NULL;
00360 
00361         _stprintf(sectionName, _T("%s %s"), pszPlInName, pszComboName);
00362 
00363         curSel = (UINT)::SendMessage(hCombo, CB_GETCURSEL, 0, 0);
00364 
00365         dwSize = ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, NULL, NULL, wKeys, MAX_PATH*2, iniFilePath);
00366         wPtr = wKeys;
00367         while (wPtr < &wKeys[dwSize])
00368         {
00369                 if ((pos = _tstoi(wPtr)) != 0)
00370                 {
00371                         /* set items */
00372                         ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, wPtr, _T(""), TEMP, MAX_PATH, iniFilePath);
00373                         FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, TEMP, 0, 0, wFormatMsg, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00374                         ::SendMessage(hCombo, CB_INSERTSTRING, pos, (LPARAM)wFormatMsg);
00375                         ::SendMessage(hCombo, CB_DELETESTRING, pos+1, 0);
00376                 }
00377                 wPtr += _tcslen(wPtr)+1;
00378         }
00379         ::SendMessage(hCombo, CB_SETCURSEL, curSel, 0);
00380 }

00382 /*************************************************************************************
00383  *      Get text
00384  */
00385 
00386 UINT getText(LPCTSTR pszPlInName, LPCTSTR pszKey, LPTSTR* ppszText, UINT length)
00387 {
00388         _stprintf(sectionName, _T("%s Text"), pszPlInName);
00389         ::GetPrivateProfileString(sectionName, pszKey, _T(""), wFormatMsg, length, iniFilePath);
00390         
00391         return FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_STRING, wFormatMsg, 0, 0, *ppszText, MAX_PATH, NULL);
00392 }
